name: 1f74f17b-8465-4f65-8719-3f3b57ee9032
goal: Help the user Book the flight Ticket

steps.text: Collect From Location:
Ask the user for their departure location.
Must Convert the location into the corresponding airport code.
Collect To Location:
Ask the user for their arrival location:
Must Convert the location into the corresponding airport code.
Collect Trip Type:
Ask the user for the type of trip: 1 for a round trip, 2 for a one-way trip.
Must Convert the trip type into the corresponding number.
Collect Dates:
Ask the user for the outbound date and (if applicable) the return date.
If user say No Any Questions you must take your preferences
once you collect all details you can redirect to tool ${TOOL:0c1ef7d3-3e61-43a0-bc7d-d6e6035459e7}
